description: Listed Building Consent in connection with extension in basement level lightwell to provide a new bedroom.
decision_conditions:
FORMAL DECISION:
Appeal A (Ref: APP/V5570/E/04/1163081)

The appeal is allowed and listed building consent granted for the partial infilling of rear basement level lightwell to provide a new bedroom at 13 Compton Terrace, London, N1 2UN in accordance with the terms of the application number P041091 dated 6th May 2004 and the plans submitted therewith, subject to the following conditions:

(1)  The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this decision.

(2)  All new works and works of making good to the retained fabric whether internally or externally shall be finished to match the adjacent work with regard to the methods used and the material, colour, texture and profile.

(3)  Before works commence, details of the joinery at a scale of 1:20 and 1:1 for the new glazing bars shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

(4)  The brickwork on the new extension hereby permitted shall match that on the rear elevation of the listed building in terms of the details of the brick arches over the new windows and the colour, size, texture, bonding and pointing of the new works.
